Word_Entry.notes: She makes delicious adobo. Very tasty!
Word_Entry.hint: She is my mother. She usually cooks for the family.

Word_Entry.notes: He was the one that made our treehouse in the backyard.
Word_Entry.hint: He is my father. He works for the family.

Word_Entry.notes: He also teases me a lot.
Word_Entry.hint: He is my older brother. He likes to play basketball.

Word_Entry.notes: She told me she really likes this boy once. I forgot his name.
Word_Entry.hint: She is my older sister. She spends a lot of her time talking with her friends.

Word_Entry.notes: We play board games a lot.

Word_Entry.notes: She also likes to tell us stories from her time.

Word_Entry.notes: He is also very cute.
Word_Entry.hint: My younger sibling. He likes to play with toys.

Word_Entry.notes: She likes to hang out with my mother.
Word_Entry.hint: She is Nanay's sister. She is a great cook too.

Word_Entry.notes: It also protects us from rain.
Word_Entry.hint: It covers the top part of the house.

Word_Entry.notes: Tita hangs picture frames around here.
Word_Entry.hint: It covers the front, side and back parts of the house.

Word_Entry.notes: We use this to get to different parts of the house too.
Word_Entry.hint: We open this one to get inside the house.

Word_Entry.notes: Sometimes you see birds just outside here.
Word_Entry.hint: They are made of glass so that you can look from the inside.

Word_Entry.notes: Tito keeps his tools here as well.

Word_Entry.notes: It looks like arrows pointing up.
Word_Entry.hint: This protects our house from strangers.

Word_Entry.notes: Did you know, Santa uses this to give us presents.
Word_Entry.hint: Smoke comes out of here when tita cooks.

Word_Entry.notes: We used this earlier to get inside the house.
Word_Entry.hint: Makes us go up.

Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of the sea.
